summary: A struggling, two-bit music manager will lose his job unless he signs a reclusive country music singer, James Hand, who also happens to be his estranged father.
cast: Blake DeLong|James Hand|Robyn Rikoon|Kevin Bales|Bode Barker|Kaci Beeler|Cedric Benson|Payton Bridges|Jeff Byrd|Michael D. Conway|Erin Corrigan|Sonny Carl Davis|Sam Wainwright Douglas|Brian Fisher|Babs George|Nathan Harlan|David Hartstein|Carlyn Hudson|Nicholas Jacobs|Jeffery Da'Shade Johnson|Keri Johnsrud|Johnny Krueger|Andy Langer|Eric Loftis|Ben Maddox|Mirna Maddox|Berndt Mader|Zell Miller III|Indigo Rael|Alejandro Rose-Garcia|Thomas Schiefer|Janelle Faythe Stephens|Brandon Thomas|Tyler Thompson|Wes Turner|Johnny Walter|David Wingo|Phillip Wolf
title: Thank You a Lot
